title: Content Editor & Writer (English)
job_overview:
We need someone with excellent English - spoken, understood, and written - to proof read articles, blogs, web pages and more. Additionally, we need this person to have the capability of writing in English with proper grammar and semantics for articles, blogs, social media posts, and other tasks upon request. Please ONLY APPLY to this job post if your written and spoken English is EXCELLENT.

The ideal candidate is a self-starter who is consistent, reliable, able to learn quickly, has the ability to problem-solve, and grow from mistakes. We prefer someone with experience in other admin duties, call transcription, data entry, SEO, website development, client relations, social media design, or other related fields since we like to give teaUpgrade to see actual infombers a chance for advancement in the company and expand into other roles if possible.

The position on our team will be 40 hrs/week, so please DO NOT APPLY to this job posting if you are not available to join our team for 40 hrs/week commitment. Working hours are a little bit flexible but must be between 6am-6pm EST in the U.S.

Starting Pay is $5.00/hr to start. As your performance showcases your talent, there is opportunity to earn pay raises and promotions.
